game.name: Devil May Cry 5
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 최강의 악마사냥꾼(데빌헌터)이 돌아왔다! 대망의 액션 게임, 전설의 스타일리시 액션 「Devil May Cry」가 드디어 부활!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The ultimate Devil Hunter is back in style, in the game action fans have been waiting for.

reviewHighlights.text: ---{ Graphics }--- ☐ You forget what reality is ☐ Beautiful ☑ Good ☐ Decent ☐ Bad ☐ Don‘t look too long at it ☐ MS-DOS ---{ Gameplay }--- ☑ Very good...
Vergil hiring Vergil's brother and Vergil's son in order to work with Vergil to kill Vergil so that Vergil can fuse with Vergil to become Vergil. 10/1...
